original_title: O Rabequeiro Maneta e a Fúria da Natureza
overview: São Paulo, 1980s. A young forró musician wakes up without his left hand after a night of love with a singer he had just met. A Brazilian journey between women and men, city and countryside, people and animals. A contemporary fable about phantom limbs.
title: O Rabequeiro Maneta e a Fúria da Natureza
